# URL blacklist for for "php-spam-filter"
# Any regular expression syntax can be used here
# 	(without the delimiters)
# All keywords are case insensitive.
# Lines starting with '#' are ignored.

theychanel\.com
everychanel\.com
get-massive-autopilot-traffic\.com
skyrocket-seo-traffic\.com
free-casino-bonus\.com
womensclothescheap\.com
familiekock\.nl
kreatorzyimprezek\.pl
livingwithrheumatoidarthritis\.org
commentjob\.ru
eekshop\.com
icamtech\.com
isglasses\.com
firefallstore\.com
gmbal\.com
mortalpath\.com
newfathersfoundation\.com
2hams\.com
accessfree\.info
aircool\.fr
bath-confetti\.com
robotfinance\.fr
fightingfatforfit
coldfilm\.ru

program[^\.\'\s]*\.(pl|eu)
pity[^\.\'\s]*\.(pl|eu)
#naszprogrampit\.pl
#programydopit2014\.pl
#pityprzeznet\.pl
#programypit2014\.pl
#programypity2014\.pl
#eprogrampity\.pl
#nowyprogrampit\.pl
#programpit2014\.eu
#nowyprogram\.pl
#dobryprogrampity\.pl

# Dating sites
loveepicentre\.com
onlinecupid\.info
plentyoffish\.info
okdating\.info
funonlinedating\.info
oksingles\.info
pollydirectory\.info
lovehomego\.com
escorts\.com # Usually ends with this

studio-gong\.si

# Any URL that contains these words is evil!
louisvuitton
paydayloan
monclerpascher
